A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Visualization/Effects (Practical/Special) - 9/10
Acting - 9/10
Sound/Music - 8/10
Film Storyline - 1/10
Trilogy Continuity - 1/10

Overall - 4.75/10

Although visually stunning\, it seemed to have left every character development made it Episode VII and cast it aside.  The story\, itself\, isn't really progressed outside of escaping the First Order fleet.  

Episode VIII felt more like Episode VII Part 2 than it's own film.
